name: Bountee Boi
description:
Become the superior paper towel brand by literally destroying the competition. Fight against, Brawnee, Vivvo and ultimately reign supremacy against the holy Shamwoah in this fast paced game.

Controls

  • Movement: Right and Left Arrows
  • Jump: Up Arrow
  • Shoot: Space Bar

Credits

  • Alexander Melendez
